contents.text: Welcome to Cricket Health in San Francisco, where we empower kidney patients to take charge of their health.
If you are a new patient and would like information on our kidney care program, press 1.
For program details and eligibility requirements, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our program information team.

navigationGoals: I want to check if I qualify and get more info on the kidney care program.
I’m interested in learning about your kidney care program and whether I’m eligible to join as a new patient.
Retrieve comprehensive eligibility criteria and protocol details for the kidney care program.
I’d like to find out if I qualify for your kidney care program.
I want to find out the eligibility requirements for the kidney care program.

contents.text: To speak with a new patient coordinator, press 2.
One moment please while we transfer you to a new patient coordinator.

navigationGoals: I’d like to speak with a new patient coordinator to begin enrollment.
I’d like to speak with a new patient coordinator to help me enroll and understand the next steps.
Connect with a new patient coordinator to initiate onboarding and discuss care plan configuration.
I want to speak directly with a new patient coordinator.
I need to speak with a new patient coordinator to begin enrollment.

contents.text: If you are an existing patient or need support with your care, press 2.
For appointment scheduling and telehealth visits, press 1.
Please hold as we connect you to our scheduling department.

navigationGoals: I need to schedule or change my next appointment or telehealth visit.
I need to schedule a follow-up telehealth appointment with my kidney care team.
Schedule a telehealth nephrology appointment and sync it with my digital calendar.
I need to schedule or change a telehealth appointment.
I want to schedule a telehealth appointment for my next kidney care visit.

contents.text: For billing, insurance, and payment questions, press 2.
One moment please while we transfer you to billing and insurance support.

navigationGoals: I have questions about my billing or insurance payment.
I have questions about my billing statements and what my insurance will cover for treatment.
Obtain billing reconciliation and insurance coverage details for my recent treatment invoice.
I have a question about my bill and insurance coverage.
I have questions about my billing statement and insurance coverage.
